title: To Tell The Truth
description: He was her friend and lover, and she refused to believe he was evil. That is, until her sister was murdered. Then Detective John Mentz came into her life and she fell in love. But did he really believe she would deliberately kill the Senator? Did he? Now he was on trial for murder, and Anna Kayce had no other choice but to take the stand and tell the truth.
author: Faye M. Tollison
